verses.name: Exodus 40:13
verses.text: And thou shalt put upon Aaron the holy garments, and anoint him, and sanctify him; that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office.

verses.name: Exodus 40:14
verses.text: And thou shalt bring his sons, and clothe them with coats:

verses.name: Exodus 40:15
verses.text: And thou shalt anoint them, as thou didst anoint their father, that they may minister unto me in the priest’s office: for their anointing shall surely be an everlasting priesthood throughout their generations.

verses.name: Exodus 40:16
verses.text: Thus did Moses: according to all that the Lord commanded him, so did he.
